TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPv4InterfaceProperties extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides information about network interfaces that support Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4).

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class provides access to configuration and address information for network interfaces that support IPv4. You do not create instances of this class; they are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv4Properties%2A> method.
For IPV6 properties, see <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv6Properties%2A>.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPInterfaceProperties.GetIPv4Properties%2A> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: abstract property int Index { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the index of the network interface associated with the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) address.
Docs.value: An that contains the index of the IPv4 interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the value of this property is zero, IPv4 is not supported by this interface.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingActive As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingActive { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface has an automatic private IP addressing (APIPA) address.
Docs.value: if the interface uses an APIPA address; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Automatic private IP addressing allows computers that do not have access to a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to be automatically assigned an IP address that does not conflict with public addresses. These addresses are in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsAutomaticPrivateAddressingEnabled { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface has automatic private IP addressing (APIPA) enabled.
Docs.value: if the interface uses APIPA; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Automatic private IP addressing allows computers that do not have access to a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to be automatically assigned an IP address that does not conflict with public addresses. These addresses are in the range 169.254.0.0 to 169.254.255.255.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDhcpEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDhcpEnabled { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the interface is configured to use a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) server to obtain an IP address.
Docs.value: if the interface is configured to obtain an IP address from a DHCP server; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this property is `true`, a DHCP server assigns the IP address to the interface when the computer establishes its network connections.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsForwardingEnabled As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsForwardingEnabled { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this interface can forward (route) packets.
Docs.value: if this interface routes packets; otherwise .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If routing is disabled, packets that are received by the interface with a destination address that is not held by the interface are discarded.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Mtu As Integer
public: abstract property int Mtu { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum transmission unit (MTU) for this network interface.
Docs.value: An value that specifies the MTU.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The MTU of a network interface is the largest packet that can be transmitted. It is measured in octets (8-bit bytes).
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UsesWins As Boolean
public: abstract property bool UsesWins { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether an interface uses Windows Internet Name Service (WINS).
Docs.value: if the interface uses WINS; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IPv4 address mappings.
## Examples The following code example gets an <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPv4InterfaceProperties> object and displays its data.
[!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#48)]
